alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:47PM MDT until August 25 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Beaverhead County in southwestern Montana... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 447 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monida, or 30 miles northwest of Idmon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Monida and Snowline. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
